title: MG Motor India sales rise 8 pc in February
description: MG Motor India has recorded an 8% rise in retail sales in February, selling 4,532 units compared to 4,193 in the same month last year. Electric vehicles accounted for around 33% of total sales. The company is also preparing for potential logistics issues caused by disruptions in global shipping.
